arts.ttl: CM: ‘A Rossoneri heart’ – why Parma-Milan means more to Cutrone
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher One of the many sub-plots to the game between Parma and AC Milan is the presence of Patrick Cutrone, who would love to score against his old club. As Calciomercato.com recall, Cutrone spent 10 years at Milan and that length of time leaves memories not easily forgotten, especially when it is also your boyhood team.
